original: We still labour under the effects of the Unequal Treaties that formalize the "Open Door Policy" towards China. The foreigners still have extraterritorial rights, and we are not in full control of our economy.
translation: 我们依旧在这些让中国“门户开放”的不平等条约下劳动。在外国人依旧享有治外法权时，我们却无法完全控制我们的经济。

original: Our armed force are rife with corruption and nepotism. If we want to turn them into a potent fighting force, we will have to engage in a lengthy and expensive program of army reform.
translation: 我们的军队充斥着腐败和裙带关系。如果我们希望这支军队成为一个强大的战斗力，那必须要进行一个漫长而代价高昂的改革。

original: The chaos of the civil war has disrupted the creation of an effective state apparatus. More than a third of available recruits are not drafted, simply because no one knows they exist. Reforming the examination process will ensure that we hire competent people.
translation: 内战造成的混乱，使得有效的国家机器无法建成。超过三分之一的可招募人才被闲置，仅仅是因为没人知道他们的存在。改革考试的过程，保证我们能雇佣有能力的人。

original: Our officers are not yet up to the task of managing a modern war. Hard lessons will have to be learned before they are truly equal to their counterparts in other nations. Educating them will be part of a bigger programm of army reform.
translation: 我们的军官还不能面对现代战争的挑战。在他们赶上其他国家同行们的水平之前，他们必须刻苦学习。教育他们将是军队改革的一个更严峻的部分。

original: The economy is showing no signs of trouble.
translation: 经济状况看起来没有问题。

original: Our economists have noticed a slight increase in inflation. We should keep an eye on that.
translation: 我们的经济学家注意到了通货膨胀稍有增加。我们应该密切关注这种情况。

original: Inflation has started to affect the economy significantly. We should consider counter-measures before things get out of hand.
translation: 通货膨胀已经开始明显地影响我们的经济了。在事态失控之前我们应当想好对应措施。

original: Government-issued money is worth less and less, purchasing power is dropping and some goods are only available to people with the right connections.
translation: 政府发行的货币正在不断贬值，购买力也在不断下降。并且有些商品只有有关系的人才能买到。

original: The value of our currency is evaporating. Prices rise dramatically from day to day. We must very urgently take counter-measures before we suffer a complete collapse.
translation: 我们货币的价值正在蒸发。物价每天都在飙升。在事态崩溃之前，我们必须采取紧急措施来应对。

original: Our system of currency has completely collapsed. In large parts of the country, trade has reverted to a barter system. Poverty is widespread. Our employees use the paper money we pay them with to heat their homes. An aggressive program of financial and economic reform is needed to resolve the situation.
translation: 我们的货币体系已经完全崩溃了。在国家的大部分地方，贸易已经退回了以物易物的水平。贫困无处不在。我们的职员们正在把发给他们的纸币当柴火烧。必须进行一场声势浩大的金融与经济改革来扭转这一局势。

original: The Warlords have declared their support for us, allowing our government to focus on resisting any foreign invader.
translation: 军阀们已经表明支持我们，使我们的政府可以专心于抵抗任何外国侵略者。
中央飞机制造厂-战斗机制造商
中央飞机制造厂-轰炸机制造商

original: The long retreat into Shanxi has depleted our forces, and the Yan'an Base Area is not yet ready to support a major uprising. It will take time or outside help to recover.
translation: 在到陕西的长征中我们的兵力已经耗尽，延安根据地还没准备好支持一次大规模的起义。我们需要时间，或者外来的帮助来恢复。

original: The peasants have suffered hard in the civil war. If we want to become accepted as the legitimate government of China, we must win their support.
translation: 农民们已经在内战中受了太多苦。如果我们想成为被大家认可的合法政府，我们必须寻求他们的支持。

original: The party is internally divided about the best way to proceed. Struggles between various factions have erupted and will continue until one of them reigns supreme.
translation: 党的内部对前进的方式存在分歧。派系斗争已经爆发，并将持续到一个派别占据领导地位。

original: Exhausted from the Long March, our Red Army is not fit for combat just yet. We must form new units and form a new Army of Liberation.
translation: 由于长征的劳累，我们的红军还不适合投入战斗。为了解放战争，我们必须组建新的军队。
亚历山大·冯·法尔肯豪森
约瑟夫·史迪威被派往中国

original: The current war in China was started hurriedly, and without the sanction of the Emperor.
translation: 在中国的战争开始得很仓促，而且没得到天皇的批准。

original: Emperor Puyi is the legitimate descendent of the Qing emperors who ruled China for three hundred years. The Xinhai Revolution which deposed him in 1911 was very popular, as the late Qing government was powerless against both the foreigners stealing Chinese land and the regional governors establishing themselves as warlords. Emperor Puyi's installation by Japan as Emperor of Manchukuo is not yet accepted by the Manchurian populace, let alone the rest of China.\n\nWe will have to establish the Emperor's independence from Japan to rally the nation under him.
translation: 溥仪皇帝是统治中国长达三百多年的清朝皇帝们的正统嫡系后裔。1911年，他的统治被辛亥革命所推翻。由于晚清政府对于外国侵略和军阀割据的无能为力，所以这场革命是受到人民支持的。溥仪身为日本人扶植的满洲国皇帝的身份尚且不被满洲人民所普遍接受，更不用说中国其他地方了。\n\n我们要让皇帝从日本人手里独立出来，并使全国国民都臣服于他。

original: Emperor Puyi is the legitimate descendent of the Qing emperors who ruled China for three hundred years. The Xinhai Revolution which deposed him in 1911 was very popular, as the late Qing government was powerless against both the foreigners stealing Chinese land and the regional governors establishing themselves as warlords. Emperor Puyi's installation by Japan as Emperor of Manchukuo is not yet accepted by the Manchurian populace, let alone the rest of China.\n\nWe will have to establish the Emperor's independence from Japan to rally the nation under him.
translation: 溥仪皇帝是统治中国长达三百多年的清朝皇帝们的正统嫡系后裔。1911年，他的统治被辛亥革命所推翻。由于晚清政府对于外国侵略和军阀割据的无能为力，所以这场革命是受到人民支持的。溥仪身为日本人扶植的满洲国皇帝的身份尚且不被满洲人民所普遍接受，更不用说中国其他地方了。\n\n我们要让皇帝从日本人手里独立出来，并使全国国民都臣服于他。

The Xinhai Revolution which deposed him in 1911 was very popular, as the late Qing government was powerless against both the foreigners stealing Chinese land and the regional governors establishing themselves as warlords. Emperor Puyi's installation by Japan as Emperor of Manchukuo is not yet accepted by the Manchurian populace, let alone the rest of China.\n\nWe will have to establish the Emperor's independence from Japan to rally the nation under him.

original: Emperor Puyi is the legitimate descendent of the Qing emperors who ruled China for three hundred years. The Xinhai Revolution which deposed him in 1911 was very popular, as the late Qing government was powerless against both the foreigners stealing Chinese land and the regional governors establishing themselves as warlords. Emperor Puyi's installation by Japan as Emperor of Manchukuo is not yet accepted by the Manchurian populace, let alone the rest of China.\n\nWe will have to establish the Emperor's independence from Japan to rally the nation under him.
translation: 溥仪皇帝是统治中国长达三百多年的清朝皇帝们的正统嫡系后裔。1911年，他的统治被辛亥革命所推翻。由于晚清政府对于外国侵略和军阀割据的无能为力，所以这场革命是受到人民支持的。溥仪身为日本人扶植的满洲国皇帝的身份尚且不被满洲人民所普遍接受，更不用说中国其他地方了。\n\n我们要让皇帝从日本人手里独立出来，并使全国国民都臣服于他。

original: Emperor Puyi is the legitimate descendent of the Qing emperors who ruled China for three hundred years. The Xinhai Revolution which deposed him in 1911 was very popular, as the late Qing government was powerless against both the foreigners stealing Chinese land and the regional governors establishing themselves as warlords. Emperor Puyi's installation by Japan as Emperor of Manchukuo is not yet accepted by the Manchurian populace, let alone the rest of China.\n\nWe will have to establish the Emperor's independence from Japan to rally the nation under him.
translation: 溥仪皇帝是统治中国长达三百多年的清朝皇帝们的正统嫡系后裔。1911年，他的统治被辛亥革命所推翻。由于晚清政府对于外国侵略和军阀割据的无能为力，所以这场革命是受到人民支持的。溥仪身为日本人扶植的满洲国皇帝的身份尚且不被满洲人民所普遍接受，更不用说中国其他地方了。\n\n我们要让皇帝从日本人手里独立出来，并使全国国民都臣服于他。

original: We are engaged in low-intensity warfare with partisans, defectors and republican terrorists. We should focus on pacifying the countryside in order to hunt these bandits down.
translation: 我们正在跟游击队、变节者和共和派恐怖分子进行低烈度战争。我们应该把安抚农村地区作为重点，以剿灭这些土匪。

original: After the 1905 Japanese seizure of Dalian from Russia, the Kwantung (Kantō in Japanese) garrison placed there became politicized, with expansionist generals taking the initiative in seizing more Chinese land for Japan. This culminated in the Mukden Incident in 1932, when the Empire of Manchukuo was carved out of the petty warlords of the north-east. The Kwantung Army continues to dominate the area and places the interests of their generals above the needs of Manchukuo.\n\nWe will only resolve this by getting the Japanese army to recognise us as equals, or by throwing them out by force.
translation: 自从1905年日本人从俄国人手里占领了大连后，关东军就开始变得政治化了，扩张主义的将军们开始开始主动为日本夺取更多中国的土地。这在九·一八事变的第二年中，当满洲帝国从东北的小军阀们那里割据了一片土地时达到了顶峰。关东军继续统治这里，并将将军们的利益置于满洲国的需求之上。\n\n我们只能让日军承认我们和他们是平等的，或者把他们用武力赶走这两种方法来解决问题。

original: Manchuria Aircraft Manufacturing Company - Fighter Division
translation: 满洲飞行机制造株式会社-战斗机制造商

original: Manchuria Aircraft Manufacturing Company - Bomber Division
translation: 满洲飞行机制造株式会社-轰炸机制造商

original: Manchuria Aircraft Manufacturing Company - Large Projects Division
translation: 满洲飞行机制造株式会社-重型飞机制造商

original: The Qing have orchestrated a surprise attack and seized a number of arms depots and ammunition dumps on their territory. It will take some time to reorganize our supply chains in their territory.
translation: 大清策划了一场突然袭击并夺取了我军在他们境内的部分军械库和弹药库。我们需要花费一定的时间才能重建我军在满洲的补给链。

original: We have created a number of makeshift workshops in backyards and cellars to produce more equipment. The quality is perhaps not as great, but they make up for it in numbers.
translation: 我们已经在后院和酒窖这种地方建立了一些可以凑活用的小工坊。虽然产品质量怎么样，但是他们可以保证数量。
